1.0.0.name: connect20/Dotsquares_Dynamictab
1.0.0.description: Product Dynamic Tab extension provides a very useful functionality to add new Dynamic Tabs in the required product’s page. Now you can easily add new content tab with the help of this extension, without the help of developer.   You can add unlimited number of Dynamic Tabs on Magento Product Page and can also delete it later if required.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
